entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Mine Centre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:14 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Atikokan 03:00 AM EST Friday 17 March 2023
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa steady
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -10.1°C
Wind: NE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:48 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023
